EmailTemplate.description: Email template for temp signs submission
EmailTemplate.name: Temp Signs Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Submitting a Request with SFMTA: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your request with SFMTA. We will be reviewing your application, and you can view the progress and log back in anytime using the following link: {!Case.Link}
At the moment, we are not accepting changes online. Please call us if you would like to make a change. Please note that 24 hours after your request is approved, these changes will incur a $50 change fee.
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
